mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer) VALUES (seq_t_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_reply SET reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate WHERE rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updatedate FROM tbl_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY rno asc
